name: Umpa
comment: Nice small coffee shop with a cozy seating area both indoors and outdoors. Friendly staff. Good variety of products and great tunes.

name: Lumpa A.
comment: We had the chocolate cake, and it was amazing! It also felt homemade, which was an extra plus ðŸ™‚ We were pleasantly surprised!

name: Alexander C.
comment: For sure one of my favorite coffee shops, lovely staff, nice coffee, and very good products.

name: Elliot A.
comment: I love it. I spent 3 hours in this coffee shop. The staff were very helpful, and the quality of the product is excellent. I'll definitely come back again!
